title.rendered: Staff Profile: Carly Sullivan, Account Manager, Clinical

content.rendered:
Carly Sullivan

Phone: 508.907.6222
Connect on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/carly-sullivan-a467b240

Specializing in the area of Clinical Research for CROs, Pharmaceutical, Biotechnology, and Medical Device companies. Positions from entry level Clinical Trial Assistants, Clinical Research Associates to Associate Director and Director levels.

ABOUT CARLY
Started at ClinLab in 2014, Clinical Operations Division & graduate of SUNY Fredonia

What makes you good at your job? My drive and competitiveness. Always striving to be better. I truly care about my clients and candidates needs and do whatever I can to help my team be successful and grow.

What is the best thing about your job? Being able to constantly grow my career and helping my team grow and be successful.


What do you do for fun? I love being active, working out and finding new places to explore. Traveling. Spending time with my family and friends. Go Buffalo Bills!

.
